title: Christs victorie, and triumph in Heauen, and earth, ouer, and after death
author: Fletcher, Giles, 1588?-1623.
notes: Dedication signed: G. Fletcher, i.e. Giles Fletcher the younger.
In this state title pages have fleur-de-lis printer's device (McKerrow 264).--STC.
"Christs triumph ouer and after death" has separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
